articles.author: Paola Tamma
articles.title: European Commission 'concerned' by China's military drills near Taiwan - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Beijing launched military exercises near Taiwan in retaliation for Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen meeting with US House Speaker Kevin McCarthy.
articles.content: The European Commission expressed concern and called for restraint on Saturday after China started three days of military exercises near Taiwan in retaliation for Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen meetin… [+1560 chars]
